_sText:
Final Version

Changes: Improved a lot of Traps

Bugfixes
Add that that teleport at t side to get outside of temple when 1 ct is outside
Start with knive only now
Lowered Lava rising speed
Lowered Treasure Chest hp


INstructions to win:

Right Crystal is with music
Left is without at begining
1 must be activadet to survive

At the end press Piramid shaped button and Chest appears
kill chest take artefact get aut fast

Others without game can just stay ner the gem wearer in that aura at least
Throw gem against Blue diamonds
And throw it in a tiny hole where a light beam comes out
See what happens
And ehm dont loose that gem

Have Fun
Post feedback in comments section
